story.title: Our story
paragraphs: FitMyCV was born from a frustration many know too well: spending hours adapting your resume for each job application. Rephrasing, reorganizing, hoping this time it will pass the recruiter filters...
We thought there had to be a better way. What if AI could help us create resumes truly tailored to each job offer?

mission.title: Our mission
paragraphs: To save you time and give you the best chances of landing that interview. No generic resume sent en masse, but a tailored CV for each opportunity.
Because every job offer is unique, your resume should be too.

FitMyCV offers an extension for Chrome, Edge, Brave and Firefox browsers. This extension adds job offer capture features directly from job sites.
13.1 Data collected by the extension

items: URLs of job offers you choose to capture
Text content of job offers (title, description, location) extracted from the visited page
Authentication token stored locally in the browser to maintain your session

content.text: 13.2 How it works

items: The extension does not collect any data outside of job offer pages where you actively click the "FitMyCV +" button
Extracted content is sent to our servers only for CV generation, then processed in the same way as offers submitted through the website
Captured offers are temporarily stored in the browser's local storage until submission
No browsing history is collected or transmitted

content.text: 13.3 Permissions

The extension requires the following permissions: active tab access (to detect job offers), local storage (to save your offers and preferences), cookies (for authentication with your FitMyCV account).
Some data may be transferred outside the European Union (OpenAI, Resend in the United States). These transfers are governed by standard contractual clauses approved by the European Commission.
This policy may be modified at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with the update date. In case of substantial changes, you will be notified by email.
